Description: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

Title: Occupation: Rainfall
Description: Two years after aliens land on Earth, survivors from Sydney, Australia, fight in a desperate war as the number of casualties continue to grow.

Title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
Description: The death of Marcus Aurelius leads to a succession crisis, in which the deceased emperor's son, Commodus, demonstrates that he is unwilling to let anything undermine his claim to the Roman Empire.

Title: L'acrobate
Description: Montreal is snowed under. While the downtown cranes dance their hypnotic ballet, two strangers meet randomly in an unfinished apartment. Their chance encounter leads to a violent attraction and a dependency beyond reason.

Title: Black Christmas
Description: On Christmas Eve, an escaped maniac returns to his childhood home, which is now a sorority house, and begins to murder the sorority sisters one by one.

Title: Au revoir les enfants
Description: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.

Title: Falling
Description: John Peterson lives with his partner Eric and their adopted daughter in Southern California. When he is visited by his aging father who is searching for a place to retire, their two very different worlds collide.

Title: He Who Dares
Description: A group of ruthless masked terrorists kidnap the Prime Ministers daughter, fortifying themselves in an underground car park rigged with explosives. A crack SAS team are sent in and must take the building one level at a time.

Title: Jack Frost
Description: A father who can't keep his promises is killed in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

Title: Lions for Lambs
Description: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

Title: Secret of the Wings
Description: Tinkerbell wanders into the forbidden Winter woods and meets Periwinkle. Together they learn the secret of their wings and try to unite the warm fairies and the winter fairies to help Pixie Hollow.

Title: On Deadly Ground
Description: A blowout firefighter takes on an environmentally destructive oil corporation by causing many deaths and explosions in Alaska.

Title: Baby Boom
Description: The life of super-yuppie J.C. is thrown into turmoil when she inherits a baby from a distant relative.

Title: How Green Was My Valley
Description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

Title: Novitiate
Description: Set in the early 1960s and during the era of Vatican II, a young woman in training to become a nun struggles with issues of faith, the changing church and sexuality.

Title: Ben Is Back
Description: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

Title: Affliction
Description: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

Title: Three Ages
Description: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

Title: Peter von Kant
Description: Peter Von Kant, a successful, famous director, lives with his assistant Karl, whom he likes to mistreat and humiliate. Through the great actress Sidonie, he meets and falls in love with Amir, a handsome young man of modest means.

Title: Munemoshune no musume tachi
Description: Rin Asogi runs a private investigation agency in Tokyo's Shinjuku district, performing odd jobs. Despite attempts at a normal life, she finds herself constantly hindered by the strange cases that come her way.

Title: Let It Snow
Description: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

Title: Babes in Toyland
Description: Mary Contrary is set to marry Tom Piper when he is kidnapped by Roderigo and Gonzorgo, two goons working for the evil Barnaby who wants to marry Mary for her inheritance.

Title: In America
Description: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.

Title: Huo zhe
Description: After Fugui and Jiazhen lose their personal fortunes, they raise a family and survive difficult cultural changes during 1940s to 1970s China.

Title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
Description: Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werewolves.

Title: Shirley
Description: A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

Title: The Santa Clause 2
Description: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

Title: The Fifth Estate
Description: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.

Title: Teströl és lélekröl
Description: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.

Title: Bad Santa 2
Description: Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.

Title: Blow the Man Down
Description: Mary Beth and Priscilla Connolly attempt to cover up a gruesome run-in with a dangerous man. To conceal their crime, the sisters must go deep into the criminal underbelly of their hometown, uncovering the town's darkest secrets.

Title: Durak
Description: Dima Nikitin is an ordinary honest plumber who suddenly decides to face the corrupt system of local politics in order to save the lives of 800 inhabitants of an old dormitory, which is about to collapse.

Title: Anne of Green Gables: The Sequel
Description: Anne Shirley accepts a teaching position at a girls boarding school in a town dominated by a rich and belligerant family determined to make her life miserable.

Title: Ivalo
Description: Arctic Circle (aka Ivalo) is set in the unforgiving polar region, amidst the icy landscapes of Finnish Lapland. In season 1 Nina Kautsalo, a Finnish police officer, finds a dying prostitute...                See full summary »

Title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a fait au bon Dieu?
Description: A French Catholic couple sees their life get turned upside-down when their four daughters get married to men of different nationalities and religions.

Title: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
Description: A young reindeer Rudolph lives at the North Pole. His father is one of Santa's reindeer and it is expected that Rudolph will eventually be one too. However, he has a feature which is a setback and causes him to be ostracized: his red nose.

Title: Death Wish V: The Face of Death
Description: Paul Kersey is back at working vigilante justice when his fiancée, Olivia, has her business threatened by mobsters.

Title: Meet Me in St. Louis
Description: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

Title: Ladder 49
Description: A firefighter, injured and trapped in a burning building, has flashbacks of his life as he drifts in and out of consciousness. Meanwhile, fellow firefighters led by the Chief attempt to rescue him.

Title: Our Kind of Traitor
Description: A couple finds themselves lured into a Russian oligarch's plans to defect, and are soon positioned between the Russian Mafia and the British Secret Service, neither of whom they can trust.

Title: Gorky Park
Description: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

Title: The Dinner
Description: Two sets of wealthy parents meet for dinner to decide what to do about a crime their sons have committed.

Title: The End of the Tour
Description: The story of the five-day interview between Rolling Stone reporter David Lipsky and acclaimed novelist David Foster Wallace, which took place right after the 1996 publication of Wallace's groundbreaking epic novel, 'Infinite Jest.'

Title: Raise the Titanic
Description: Once they said God himself couldn't sink her. Then they said no man on Earth could reach her. But an underwater research agency, headed by Admiral James Sandecker, is assigned the job of finding the doomed ship in her North Atlantic grave.

Title: Sans toit ni loi
Description: A young woman's body is found frozen in a ditch. Through flashbacks and interviews, we see the events that led to her inevitable death.

Title: The Miracle Season
Description: After the tragic death of star volleyball player Caroline "Line" Found, a team of dispirited high school girls must band together under the guidance of their tough-love coach in hopes of winning the state championship.

Title: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
Description: Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.

Title: Russkiy kovcheg
Description: A 19th century French aristocrat, notorious for his scathing memoirs about life in Russia, travels through the Russian State Hermitage Museum and encounters historical figures from the last 200+ years.

Title: Reindeer Games
Description: After assuming his dead cell-mate's identity to get with the other man's girlfriend, an ex-convict finds himself a reluctant participant in a casino heist.

Title: Vals Im Bashir
Description: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

Title: Funny Farm
Description: A couple swap city life for the country, but their picturesque new hometown turns out to be just a little bit different to what they were expecting.

Title: Shurayukihime
Description: A strikingly beautiful young woman is trained from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.

Title: Woman Walks Ahead
Description: Catherine Weldon, a portrait painter from 1890s Brooklyn, travels to Dakota to paint a portrait of Sitting Bull and becomes embroiled in the Lakota peoples' struggle over the rights to their land.

Title: Hart's War
Description: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

Title: Hot Dog ...The Movie
Description: Harkin Banks heads to skiing championships in California. A teen runaway tags along as he parties and competes with friends and foes.

Title: Light of My Life
Description: Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested.

Title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
Description: After a freak accident, a company executive turns completely invisible, goes on the run and becomes hunted by a treacherous CIA official, whilst trying to cope with his new reality.

Title: Tôkyô goddofâzâzu
Description: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

Title: Alone in the Dark
Description: A few dangerous and delusional mental patients break out of a mental asylum during a power blackout, and lay siege to their new doctor's house, who, they believe, killed their previous doctor.

Title: Johnny Tsunami
Description: A Hawaiian teenage surfer shows off his skills when he takes to the snow slopes in Vermont.

Title: La chiave
Description: 1940s Venice. After twenty years of marriage, a retired art critic and his younger wife feel their passion is waning. To help her shed her inhibitions and rekindle their relationship, the professor records his sexual fantasies in a diary.

Title: Snow Day
Description: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

Title: Horsemen
Description: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

Title: O.J.: Made in America
Description: A chronicle of the rise and fall of O.J. Simpson, whose high-profile murder trial exposed the extent of American racial tensions, revealing a fractured and divided nation.

Title: Super Fly
Description: The daily routine of cocaine dealer Priest who wants to score one more super deal and retire.

Title: Haider
Description: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

Title: Frozen Planet II
Description: Following life in the frozen regions of the planet, including polar bears, Siberian tigers, snow monkeys, and penguins.

Title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
Description: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

Title: Sennen joyû
Description: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

Title: White Fang
Description: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

Title: This Island Earth
Description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

Title: Mitt liv som hund
Description: In the late '50s, young Ingemar is sent away from his sick mother to live with his aunt and uncle. There he meets a town of eccentrics, and learns about love, sexual desire - and himself.

Title: Doragon bôru chô: Burorî
Description: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

Title: Single All the Way
Description: Desperate to avoid his family's judgment about his perpetual single status, Peter convinces his best friend Nick to join him for the holidays and pretend that they're now in a relationship.

Title: Arctic Justice
Description: An Arctic fox works in the mailroom of a package delivery service, but wants to be doing the deliveries.

Title: Les survivants
Description: Samuel, a man who lives in the Italian Alps, decides to help Chehreh, an Afghan woman, arrive in France. They will have to face a hostile nature and the cruelty of the men who inhabit this territory.

Title: Ahlat Agaci
Description: An unpublished writer returns to his hometown after graduating, where he seeks sponsors to publish his book while dealing with his father's deteriorating indulgence into gambling.

Title: Ice Station Zebra
Description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

Title: Import Export
Description: A nurse from Ukraine searches for a better life in the West, while an unemployed security guard from Austria heads East for the same reason.

Title: Hjartasteinn
Description: In a fishing village in Iceland, a boy develops feelings for his best friend as his best friend pursues his affections for a girl.

Title: 8 femmes
Description: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!

Title: Seules les bêtes
Description: A woman disappeared. After a snowstorm, her car is discovered on a road to a small remote village. While the police don't know where to start, five people are linked to the disappearance. Each one with his or her own secret.

Title: Bajo Cero
Description: On a lonely road, a prison transport is brutally assaulted. Martin, the policeman who was driving, survives and fortifies his position while the con men search for a way to finish him.

Title: Lost Horizon
Description: When a revered diplomat's plane is diverted and crashes in the peaks of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to an isolated monastery at Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.

Title: The Glenn Miller Story
Description: Biography of bandleader Glenn Miller from his beginnings to his death over the English Channel in December 1944.

Title: Bigfoot Family
Description: Follow up to Son of Bigfoot: Father uses his new fame to fight against an Alaska oil company but when he disappears the son, the mother, a raccoon and a bear head North to rescue him.

Title: Love Letter
Description: When exchanging letters two women discover new things about a man they knew.

Title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
Description: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

Title: Shoot to Kill
Description: An F.B.I. Agent teams up with a tracker to pursue a murderer after he vanishes into the mountains and infiltrates a hiking group.

Title: War and Peace
Description: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia, including his disastrous 1812 invasion, serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

Title: The Indian Runner
Description: A Vietnam vet comes home to his small town and finds himself in conflict with rules that his brother has vowed to uphold.

Title: France
Description: A celebrity journalist, juggling her busy career and personal life, has her life over-turned by a freak car accident.

Title: Dutch
Description: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.

Title: Bell Book and Candle
Description: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.

Title: Friends with Kids
Description: Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.

Title: Away from Her
Description: A man coping with the institutionalization of his wife because of Alzheimer's disease faces an epiphany when she transfers her affections to another man, Aubrey, a wheelchair-bound mute who also is a patient at the nursing home.

Title: Atlantis: Milo's Return
Description: Milo and Kida reunite with their friends to investigate strange occurances around the world that seem to have links to the secrets of Atlantis.

Title: Transsiberian
Description: A Transsiberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

Title: Salinjaui gieokbeob
Description: A former serial killer with Alzheimer's fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

Title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
Description: The Batman has returned after a 10-year absence. The Gotham authorities want to arrest him. An old foe wants a reunion. The Feds want the Man of Tomorrow to put a stop to him.

Title: Wildling
Description: A blossoming teenager uncovers the dark secret behind her traumatic childhood.

Title: BloodRayne: The Third Reich
Description: Rayne joins a resistence group to fight against the Nazis during world war two.

Title: The Plague Dogs
Description: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

Title: Decoys
Description: Luke and Roger are just another couple of college guys trying to lose their virginity. But when Luke sees something unusual, he begins to suspect that the girls on campus aren't exactly human.

Title: The Shop Around the Corner
Description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

Title: Downtown Owl
Description: Based on the novel by Chuck Klosterman, Downtown Owl is a sparkle dark Reagan Era comedy set in the fictional town of Owl, North Dakota in the leading days up to the region's blizzard in Minnesota's century.

Title: Frozen Planet
Description: Focuses on life and the environment in both the Arctic and Antarctic.

Title: Dersu Uzala
Description: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

Title: Alferd Packer: The Musical
Description: The sole survivor of an ill-fated mining expedition tells how his taste for gold was replaced by that of human flesh.

Title: Noruwei no mori
Description: Toru recalls his life in the 1960s, when his friend Kizuki killed himself and he grew close to Naoko, Kizuki's girlfriend, and another woman, the outgoing, lively Midori.

Title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
Description: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

Title: Kraftidioten
Description: After his son is murdered by drug dealers, a snowplow driver starts seeking revenge.

Title: The Savages
Description: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.

Title: Wind Chill
Description: Two college students share a ride home for the holidays, but when they break down on a deserted stretch of road, they are preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there.

Title: Kompromat
Description: A French diplomat must escape an FSB plot in Siberia.

Title: Bus Stop
Description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

Title: Brat
Description: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

Title: Hana-bi
Description: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.

Title: Adam
Description: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

Title: I Still See You
Description: Set ten years after an apocalyptic event that killed millions and left the world inhabited by ghosts.

Title: Last Survivors
Description: A father and son, who have been living off grid for 20 years, encounter an outsider who threatens to destroy the utopia they've built.

Title: Albert Nobbs
Description: Albert Nobbs struggles to survive in late 19th-century Ireland, where women aren't encouraged to be independent. Posing as a man so she can work as a butler in Dublin's most elegant hotel, Albert meets a handsome painter and looks to escape the lie she has been living.

Title: Blackboard Jungle
Description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

Title: The Winter Guest
Description: A recent widow, who is determined to leave Scotland for Australia with her son, gets an unexpected visit from her aging mother.

Title: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
Description: A historic chronicle based on the book by Dee Brown explains how Native Americans were displaced as the United States expanded west.

Title: Gekijô-ban Naruto: Daikatsugeki! Yukihime ninpôchô dattebayo!!
Description: Naruto and his team are hired to protect a young actress from three rogue warriors in the Land of the Snow.

Title: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
Description: After being tracked down by Harry Flynn, Nathan Drake goes on a quest for Marco Polo's lost fleet. However when things take an unexpected turn for the worst, Drake must rely on those closest to him in order to find the Cintomani Stone.

Title: Whitney
Description: An in-depth look at the life and music of Whitney Houston.

Title: Il traditore
Description: The real life of Tommaso Buscetta, the so-called "boss of the two worlds," the first mafia informant in Sicily in the 1980s.

Title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
Description: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.

Title: Fritt vilt
Description: 5 young Norwegians head up to the mountains to snowboard. One breaks his leg and it's getting dark soon, so they spend the night in a big, abandoned hotel, closed 30 years ago. They are not alone.

Title: Julia
Description: At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.

Title: Ningen no jôken
Description: A Japanese pacifist, unable to face the dire consequences of conscientious objection, is transformed by his attempts to compromise with the demands of war-time Japan.

Title: La Grande Illusion
Description: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

Title: Wakefield
Description: A lawyer on the edge of madness decides to disassociate himself from his own life.

Title: Creation
Description: Torn between faith and science, and suffering hallucinations, English naturalist Charles Darwin struggles to complete 'On the Origin of Species' and maintain his relationship with his wife.

Title: Meru
Description: Three elite climbers struggle to find their way through obsession and loss as they attempt to climb Mount Meru, one of the most coveted prizes in the high stakes game of Himalayan big wall climbing.

Title: Sam gang 2
Description: An Asian cross-cultural trilogy of horror films from accomplished indie directors.

Title: Kill Your Friends
Description: An A&R man working at the height of the Britpop music craze goes to extremes in order to find his next hit.

Title: The Christmas Chronicles: Part Two
Description: Kate Pierce, now a cynical teen, is unexpectedly reunited with Santa Claus when a mysterious troublemaker threatens to cancel Christmas - forever.

Title: Iron Will
Description: A brave young man is thrust into adulthood as he and his courageous team of sled dogs embark on a grueling and treacherous cross-country marathon.

Title: Alone in Berlin
Description: After a Nazi German working class couple loses their son in World War II, they decide to retaliate by secretly leafletting handwritten cards in Berlin denouncing their government.

Title: Napola - Elite für den Führer
Description: Friedrich's boxing skills gets him in an elite Nazi high school in a castle in 1942. He enrolls against his dad's wish as it promises a brighter future. It's not what he expected.

Title: Collide
Description: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Cologne high-speed Autobahn.

Title: Dnevnoy dozor
Description: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

Title: The Package
Description: Experienced Green Beret sergeant Johnny Gallagher is escorting a prisoner, Airborne Ranger Thomas Boyette, back to the US, but Boyette escapes and Gallagher must risk life and limb to catch him.

Title: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
Description: An adrenaline seeking snowboarder gets lost in a massive winter storm in the back country of the High Sierras where he is pushed to the limits of human endurance and forced to battle his own personal demons as he fights for survival...."

Title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
Description: A massacre at a Russian airport leads to a war between Russia and the United States. Meanwhile, a Task Force is sent to find the perpetrators and bring the bloodshed to an end.

Title: Extinction
Description: And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now.

Title: I Smile Back
Description: Addicted to drugs and alcohol, a housewife's self-destructive behavior starts to take its toll on her husband and two young children.

Title: We Are Still Here
Description: In the cold, wintery fields of New England, a lonely old house wakes up every thirty years - and demands a sacrifice.

Title: Urban Legends: Final Cut
Description: A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.

Title: Dylda
Description: 1945, Leningrad. WWII has devastated the city, demolishing its buildings and leaving its citizens in tatters, physically and mentally. Two young women search for meaning and hope in the struggle to rebuild their lives amongst the ruins.

Title: A Boy Called Christmas
Description: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

Title: Stories We Tell
Description: A film that excavates layers of myth and memory to find the elusive truth at the core of a family of storytellers.

Title: Skipped Parts
Description: An ungrounded young mother and her thoughtful teenage son are banished to a remote provincial town by her domineering father.

Title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
Description: In order to support her ten children, Evelyn Ryan enters a commercial jingle-writing contest.

Title: Yara
Description: A determined prosecutor becomes consumed with the case of a missing 13-year-old and goes to extreme lengths to get to the truth. Based on a real case.

Title: Stranger: Mukô hadan
Description: A swordsman from a strange land is caught in a struggle between morality, righteousness, and devotion as he reluctantly agrees to take a raggedy boy and his dog to a remote, Buddhist temple.

Title: Ernest et Célestine
Description: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

Title: The Boys of St. Vincent
Description: The true story of boys being sexually abused at their orphanage ran by a religious community in Newfoundland.

Title: I Am Not a Serial Killer
Description: In a small Midwestern town, a troubled teen with homicidal tendencies must hunt down and destroy a supernatural killer while keeping his own inner demons at bay.

Title: Ma ma
Description: In the aftermath of a tragedy a woman, Magda, reacts with a surge of newfound life that engulfs her circle of family and friends.

Title: Superman: Red Son
Description: What if baby Kal-El's rocket landed, not in Kansas, but in the Soviet Union? That is the premise of this Elseworld's tale from DC Comics.

Title: Dying of the Light
Description: When a devastating illness threatens to end Evan Lake's career in the C.I.A., he goes rogue to hunt down a terrorist who tortured him during a mission gone awry years ago.

Title: The Odessa File
Description: Following the suicide of an elderly Jewish man, a journalist in possession of the man's diary investigates the alleged sighting of a former S.S. Captain, who commanded a concentration camp during World War II.

Title: Restrepo
Description: A year with one platoon in the deadliest valley in Afghanistan.

Title: Urban Legends: Bloody Mary

Description: Marisa Serafini sits down with Carter Evancic at the Hearties Family Reunion 4 in Vancouver, Canada. Carter talks about funny snowball moments, scary fires in the church and his thanks to all the Hearties.

Title: Andy's Safari Adventures
Description: Andy heads to the Himalayas in his safari-mobile in search of the elusive snow leopard. Along the way, he shrinks down and goes flying with a golden eagle.

Title: Front Row Boston: In Studio
Description: Massachusetts natives Kelly Zutrau and Joe Valle (currently Brooklyn based) stopped by our Fraser Performance Studio on a snowy Monday morning to perform a very stripped down acoustic set.

Title: Francuz koji ce dobiti Oskara u Srbiji
Description: Arnaud goes to the gym club, but he doesn't have money so he goes outside with the snow. He met Ivona doing her running.

Title: The Letter for the King
Description: The Red Riders drive their captives high into the snowy mountains. Caught in a storm, Tiuri and Lavinia take shelter inside an ominous monastery.

Title: Steve
Description: Actress Marsai Martin ("Black-ish" and "Little"); a single-woman update; New Jersey high school seniors step in, during a snowstorm, to help a neighbor get to her dialysis treatment;

Title: Meitantei Conan
Description: While up in the snowy mountains to make Valentine's Day chocolate with Ran and Sonoko, Conan stumbles upon the murder of a photographer.

Title: The Girls Next Door
Description: The girls go to Vail for a snowboarding vacation.

Title: American Chopper: The Series
Description: In the the uphill battle to finish the Liberty Bike, Paul Sr. Proposes a spontaneous snow tubing trip. Back at the shop, the pressure mounts as Paulie realizes the bike's exhaust doesn't fit and the rear fender's a bender.

Title: Mission Declassified
Description: Christof heads to the woods of the UK and snowy fields of Canada to determine what the truth is behind UFO sightings. He soon uncovers a much bigger story behind what secrets the government is hiding.

Title: Parchhayee: Ghost Stories by Ruskin Bond
Description: Nick gives his 'overcoat' to Julie as the night is snowy and asks her to meet him the next morning to return the coat. Will Julie ever be able to return his overcoat?

Title: Random Shit
Description: At last, the episode Gerard has been waiting for. The Game of Thrones of comedy. We see a castle, knights, snow and, not unimportantly, Gijs Naber. In this Norwegian fairytale, Gunder and Hallfrød set out on an unusual quest.

Title: Maine Cabin Masters
Description: Chase and the crew are tasked with a relocation and land manifestation of a family Yurt. With a budget of $15,000 and a five-week timeline, the new Yurt Masters move quickly to get the Yurt ready before the oncoming ice and snow.

Title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
Description: Dylan Dreyer visits India's self-cleaning Ganges River, which helps populations thrive; Himalayan blue sheep and snow leopards show their climbing skills; the Indian rhino offers a glimpse of its lifestyle.

Title: The Artist's Adventures
Description: May brings snow to Russian streets. Andrey Batt visits the "Alien: Covenant" premiere in Moscow. Finally Batt performed at the Holi Fest 2017.

Title: Legendary Locations
Description: From a cursed clock in Prague to a death-defying rescue in the snowy Sierra Nevada Mountains, Josh Gates explores six legendary locations that have withstood the test of time.

Title: Jakers! The Adventures of Piggley Winks
Description: Piggley is disappointed when his father can't afford to get him a new snow sled for his birthday, but he learns the best gifts are those from the heart.

Title: Have You Been Paying Attention?
Description: Tom Gleisner quizzes Ed Kavalee, Sam Pang, Amanda Keller, Peter Helliar and Genevieve Fricker. Special guest quizmaster: snowboarder Scotty James and SBS Eurovision host Myf Warhurst.

Title: Kiddyzuzaa
Description: Elsa has been making snowflakes for hours and needs to take a nap but when she wakes up she finds that all her has hair gone.

Title: This Old House
Description: Installing rafters for a cantilevered roof; solving a venting problem for the kitchen sink; mixing AC ductwork; installing snow cleats on the roof.

Title: Rock the Park
Description: There are endless ways for Colton and Jack to have fun in snow and ice during wintry weather. No matter if it is snowmobiling, skiing, mountaineering, or ice climbing.

Title: In Search of Speed
Description: Ski racing legends Lindsey Vonn and Mikaela Shiffrin return to snow to kick off the 2017-18 season with quality training in New Zealand.

Title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls
Description: Bear and his guest, ex 'The Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent and former U.S. marine who served in Afghanistan, comedian Rob Riggle, take on Iceland's biggest glacier in midwinter. They also try pemmican and a reindeer head.

Title: Seven Worlds One Planet
Description: The snowy shores and icy waters of Antarctica are home to some of the most amazing and unusual wildlife in the world. However, even here, many species face extinction due to rapid climate change and overhunting.

Title: Madicken
Description: Christmas time, the snow has already come, and in the small town there is life and movement. Lisabet has been allowed to go with Alva there. But when Alva goes to a store to buy some secret Christmas presents, Lisabet has to stay outside.

Title: The Middle
Description: The series concludes as the family escorts Axl to Colorado. Meanwhile the long affair of the snow globe and its relation to Sean and Sue's relationship comes to a head.

Title: Ask This Old House
Description: Testing a smart stud finder; repairing a wood floor that had been burned; using a table saw safely; replacing and improving foundation plantings that had been crushed by snow.

Title: The Wild Canadian Year
Description: Lynx hunt hares in the forest while wolves and caribou clash on the tundra. Owls hunt over the snow and red foxes try to surprise their prey.

Title: Nature's Strangest Mysteries: Solved
Description: How did a moose get stuck in an apple tree? Why is a crow snowboarding on a jam jar lid? Is Yellowstone's super volcano about to erupt?

Title: Gentleman Jack
Description: Halifax is smashed to pieces by a mob hungry for political change. It's a dangerous time to be a Tory, and a lesbian, but Anne Lister refuses to keep a low profile.

Title: Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures
Description: Darth Vader and his special snowtroopers lead an attack on the rebel base on Hoth.

Title: Southern Charm
Description: Chelsea, Cameran, Eliza, Danni and Kathryn hit the slopes for their first-ever ski lesson, while Craig, Austen and Madison go snowboarding; Austen and Madison's relationship heats up, tensions rise during a cannibus-infused dinner.

Title: Go Away, Unicorn!
Description: When Unicorn's horn accidentally brings a snowman to life, he and Alice are thrilled - until a sudden heatwave starts to melt their chilly new pal.

Title: Mumble Bumble
Description: Our three pals have some fun in the snow by sledding down the mountains and making a snowman (and a snow hippo).

Title: Megastructures
Description: Riverfront State Prison in New Jersey is impenetrable, but the concrete cell blocks all need to come down. From the deadly risk of asbestos to snowy winter storms, there are obstacles at every turn.

Title: Gennem Grønland - med Nikolaj Coster-Waldau
Description: Nikolaj is joined by his wife Nukâka, and together they travel to Uummannaq in Western Greenland, where she grew up as a child. Nukâka explains how it was to grow up with sled dogs, snowmobile scooters, fishing etc.

Title: The Life and Times of Juniper Lee
Description: A demon traps June's friends and family inside a snow globe during Jody's sister's Bat Mitzvah.

Title: Rupert
Description: After Santa asks him to find out why it hasn't snowed this winter, Rupert finds himself adrift on an ice floe in the middle of the Arctic Ocean, in pursuit of the stolen North Pole.

Title: Pingu
Description: Grandfather tells Pingu about the moon and he desperately wants to visit. With Pinga's help, Pingu makes a rocket from a barrel, some tin foil and snow.

Title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
Description: It's New Years and the Power Rockers are all packed up to travel home. Suddenly, a snowstorm crushes their plans. Through the magic of music, they'll travel around the world anyway, spending New Years together.

Title: Henry's World
Description: Henry's Christmas Gifts: Henry carrot wishes for a way to get Christmas presents for everyone on his list. Snow Day: Henry procrastinates on his science project, then carrot-wishes for a snow day to buy him some precious time.

Title: Mahô no star magical Emi
Description: Misaki meets a snow fairy who will take him on a fantastic journey to the limit of the incredible.

Title: PINY Institute of New York
Description: The PINY students are going on a snow trip. Michelle is elated because she's never skied before and is looking forward to a special day with her friends. But Tasha seems more interested in hanging out with Julia and the Beautiful People.

Title: Ryan's Mystery Playdate
Description: Neither rain, nor sleet, nor snow will stop Ryan from doing his challenges and meeting his playdate. Ryan dunks, dribbles, and dazzles through challenges to figure out who is his ballin' mystery playdate.

Title: Hey Paula
Description: A snowstorm in Philly leaves Paula stranded in a hotel room which ultimately drives her stir-crazy and panicked that she may not be able to make it to NYC for her Letterman appearance.

Title: Super Wings!
Description: A mishap clogs a hot spring in Nagano, Japan, causing several new hot springs to appear; Donnie's Build-It Buddies turn the calamity into a great new water park for both people and snow monkeys to enjoy.

Title: Code of the Wild
Description: Brothers Casey and Chris Keefer trek through snow, slot canyons and relentless terrain in pursuit of a legendary Aztec treasure said to be hidden in the mountains of Utah.

Title: Cupcake Championship
Description: It's a showdown of Christmas cupcakes as four top bakers battle it out making edible snow globes. Judges Nacho Aguirre, Amirah Kassem and Maureen McCormick determine which cupcake designer goes home after the first round.

Title: Thunderbirds Are Go
Description: An avalanche traps blogger Brandon Berringer and his pal Goose in a treacherous snowy basin. Scott, Alan and Virgil must work carefully to dig out Brandon without triggering a second disaster with their vehicles.

Title: £1 Houses: Britain's Cheapest Street
Description: Victoria organises a Christmas party, but will anyone turn up? John risks all by wanting everything perfect. Ibby's dreams of a bespoke cinema room run in to trouble with the discovery of rising water in the cellar.

Title: How We Used to Live
Description: The winter of early 1947 sees record low temperatures and widespread persistent snow, causing disruption across the country.

Title: Baby Animals Through the Seasons
Description: This time we look at playful youngsters who extract the most fun out of winter. Brown bear babies enjoy this time of the year along with baby snow monkeys enjoying time in hot springs. Tasmanian Devil babies seek out a cosy den.

Title: Coop and Cami Ask the World
Description: Cami goes to great lengths to try and persuade Principal Walker to call a snow day and cancel school, including enlisting their local weatherman Duke Thunders for help.

Title: Wild_Life
Description: Although not as imposing as polar bears, smaller creatures like the arctic fox and snowy owl have the skills to survive their brutal environment.

Title: Outrageous Vacation Videos
Description: A tourist on safari assists in the rescue of an elephant; an extreme snowboarding event takes a dangerous turn; a family catches a mysterious underwater creature on camera.

Title: Pat Moore: Blueprint
Description: Pat Moore may be a veteran in the world of snowboarding, but he still has the same excitement as the rookies he's grooming to be the next generation of pros. Pat hits the road with some young bucks that push each other to the next levels.

Title: Who is J.O.B?
Description: Jamie O'Brien and friends are on an adventure in Canada and they head to Whistler to take advantage of the snow. En route, they find a drainage ditch that's begging to be surfed. Then it's off to the mountains for some epic shredding.

Title: Ride to the Roots
Description: Queralt Castellet is one of the best snowboarders in the world, but it took a lot to get there.

Title: Molly of Denali
Description: Molly can't wait to catch her first fish, but when she gets to the river the only thing she catches is Tooey's missing boot. Then, Molly suggests a community fun-raiser to fix her school roof after a snow storm.

Title: Life's First-Evers with Jeannie
Description: Jeannie helps an incredible woman give her family the surprise of a lifetime, and takes them on their first ever family vacation to see snow for the first time.

Title: Extreme RVs
Description: Entegra Coach creates a mobile living space that rides like a luxury sedan. Then it's a pro snowboarder with a rolling ski lodge, a fully restored vintage find and a quirky Sprinter van for trips across the English countryside.

Title: ABC of...
Description: Learn the history of snowboarding, from its humble origins to its spectacular adrenaline-fuelled present. Snowboarding is a way of life for those who are hooked on it and, once you've watched this, you might be too.

Title: Alaskan Bush People
Description: With winter closing in, the Wolfpack races to build their homes before the ground begins to freeze. Later, a snowstorm threatens progress as they haul Bear's new house--a shipping container--up to the highest peak on the mountain.

Title: Modern Marvels
Description: The story of snow including how it is formed and the human inventions that help us live with the white stuff.

Title: True Terror with George Takei
Description: One morning in February 1855, residents of Devon, England awoke to find 40 miles worth of hoof-like footprints in the snow. Were the footprints made by a mysterious animal? Or were they left by - the Devil himself?

Title: Endro~!
Description: Caught in the middle of a blizzard on a snowy mountain, the girls try to keep themselves from falling asleep by talking about their dreams for the future.

Title: Player Select
Description: IHasCupquake climbs a crazy mountain in "Getting Over It" and Jacksepticeye snowboards down an extreme peak in "Steep." Nick Eh 30 goes for 15 kills and the victory in "Fortnite."

Title: Lucas the Spider
Description: Lucas the Spider is cold from the snow storm outside. He begs to be in the house to get some warmth from the flames.

Title: The Routineproof Project - A Prova De Rotina
Description: Driven by adrenaline, Vander and Ray decide to travel farther north to show the nearby region of Quebec City. Ray almost loses his camera. Semi-frozen waterfalls, ice hotel, snowboard, Fatbike and Slackline are all part of this adventure.

Title: Late Show with David Letterman
Description: A guy whose flight from LaGuardia to Atlanta was delayed by snow sits in with the band; Mayor Bloomberg presents the Top Ten; Alan wants Dwight the Troubled Teen to shovel snow.

Title: Keep Your Tips Up
Description: Sean Pettit attends the Powder Awards and gears up for the first winter session at Whistler, Canada, joined by snowboarders Mikey Rencz, Eero Niemela, and Iikka Backstrom. The Groovemeister begins his new career as a restaurant owner.

Title: Play School
Description: Using a card table, chairs, doonas and pillows. Monica and Simon build a summer cave and a snowy winter cave for the Play School bear. Monica presents the Play School weather report. Making a snow dome.

Title: Blind Wave Plays Video Games
Description: Calvin has defeated Revolver Ocelot. Now to contact Meryl and make it across a empty snowy field. It is and empty field right...?

Title: Moving Art
Description: The northernmost area of Japan has rich snowfall in winter that covers the abundant mountains and trees. Red foxes, fish owls and swans, red crown cranes, thrive while snow monkey's bathes in hot springs.

Title: Minecraft Epic
Description: Felix starts construction on his new house, happens across atomic creepers, and creates a sentient snowman.

Title: Gordon Ramsay: Uncharted
Description: Gordon journeys to the Alaskan Panhandle to discover Alaskan cuisine; he learns to cook seal with a native Tingit elder, climbs a rock face in a snowstorm and goes grouse hunting before preparing a feast with local chef Lionel Uddipa.

Title: Zone of Champions
Description: Dog Jenga, Semi-Pro Car Parking and Wilfully Dangerous Snooker are among the sports that may not look like sports, but definitely are sports featured in the final edition of the programme.

Title: Critical Role
Description: The Mighty Nein find themselves transported to snowy Mythburrow in pursuit of a white dragon, and must use all their wisdom to escape with their prize and their lives intact.

Title: Quack Pack
Description: Donald becomes insanely jealous and starts seeing rivals in anyone Daisy comes in contact with including his own nephews. He becomes convinced that in order to win her love back, he must win a snow race.

Title: Little People, Big World
Description: The kids have a snow day, but Zach cannot play in the snow because of his cast.

Title: Alphablocks
Description: It's snowing. The Alphablocks whip up a wondrous winter wonderland, but can they get Mr Snowman to the North Pole before he melts?

Title: Antiques Road Trip
Description: Arusha Irvine and James Braxton travel up the east coast from Northumberland to Edinburgh in search of antiques. En route to the auction they investigate a smuggler's palatial hiding place and get a taste for some local delicacies.

Title: Hidden Europe
Description: A Norwegian snow safari reveals the secrets of Norway's winter wildlife and their fight to survive in the Arctic wilderness.

Title: Yoko! Jakamoko! Toto!
Description: Yoko, Jakamoko and Toto meet some penguins and learn how to play in the snow.

Title: Call the Shots
Description: Add a Plot

Title: Kureimoa
Description: An unstoppable army of Awakened Beings is slaughtering Claymores in distant snowy wastelands. The war for the northern territories begins.

Title: Million Dollar Listing New York
Description: Steve works to install an elevator in his new listing. Tyler gets a wake-up call while hosting a morning open house. Fredrik's husband's love of New York turns chilling during a raging snowstorm. Ryan re-brands a nameless neighborhood.

Title: P's in a Pod
Description: Pete and Polly head to a bodega to stock up on snacks for a TV binge. Every customer thinks Pete is an employee, leading him to the realization that he looks Indian. This news snowballs into an outburst that has the whole store in a tizzy.

Title: Truck Games
Description: Grandpa Ted is today the largest snowman manufacturer in TrucksCity, challenging the MiniTrucks to make a snowman bigger than his own. Let's go to the mountain .

Title: Game Breakers
Description: At Sochi 2014, Japan landed historic medals in snowboard halfpipe, one of them is by a stylish teenager from the small salmon town Murakami.

Title: Growing Up Gotti
Description: John's got a new paintball gun, and Uncle Pete challenges the boys to a big paintball war in the snowy woods.

Title: Ski-Boy
Description: Bobbie and Sadie attempt a spot of matchmaking between a pair of tourists, but the affair gets somehow snowbound.

Title: Jade Fever
Description: Claudia pulls out all the stops to try and make a big sale to jade buyers, while up at the mine Guy and Gary struggle through the first snowstorm of the season.

Title: The Head
Description: Arthur reveals that the body they found buried in the snow doesn't belong to any of the Polaris VI. It appears to be from a failed mission that ended in tragedy.

Title: King of Kensington
Description: On their way to spending Christmas at a lodge, Larry, Gladys, Jack and Tina get snowed in at a truck stop.

Title: Pani poni dasshu!
Description: The year is drawing to a close, and a large comet heading straight for planet Earth may be the cause of an unbelievably cold snowstorm!

Title: Cry Babies Magic Tears
Description: Kristal comes to visit and encourages the Cry Babies Magic Tears to make a very cool plan in the snow but will they do it?

Title: Baby Looney Tunes
Description: "Taz learns a tough lesson: He shouldn't spin after eating too much candy. The babies experience their first snowfall."

Title: Watership Down
Description: It's been snowing and the grass has turned white. The rabbits plan on having a big feast, But with no food, Hazel, Bigwig, Hawkbit, Dandelion, Fiver and Kehaar set off to find some.

Title: Annoying Orange HOW2
Description: If you get into a snowball fight, you're going to want to know how to make the perfect snowball. Well here's how.

Title: Emm wie Meikel
Description: The poor Yeti is homesick for "his" mountains, for ice and snow.

Title: Lisey's Story
Description: Lisey calls Professor Dashmiel to warn him about Jim Dooley, who is already close at hand.

Title: The Great Food Truck Race
Description: Tyler Florence challenges five aspiring food truck teams with naughty and nice holiday ingredients in snowy Wolfeboro, New Hampshire. They must compete for sales while battling the elements in a winter wonderland.

Title: Hatchimals: Adventures in Hatchtopia
Description: A Pixie power showdown snowballs out of control and Hatchtopia gets a little chilly.

Title: Maggie and the Ferocious Beast
Description: Maggie's got a magic snow globe that makes it snow in Nowhere Land! The three friends build a snowman, who comes to life as the very jovial Mr. Shivers.

Title: Fear Itself
Description: Taking refuge in an isolated snow-covered fort, four criminals find secrets, dangers and three alluring sirens.

Title: Epic Trails
Description: Eric Hanson returns to Banff National Park and Lake Louise in the snowy months to explore the backcountry by snowshoe and snowboard.

Title: The Wombles
Description: The wombles wake up to discover Wimbeldon Common is covered in a blanket of snow. However, Great Uncle Bulgaria still insists they go out and work.

Title: Life Below Zero
Description: Sue clears her runway of snow. Denise learns to dogsled. Jessie snares rabbits. Ricko teaches his son Skyler to hunt.

Title: Teen Kids News
Description: The Double H Ranch; Saturday Science Seminars; Circus Smirkus; the job interview; Olympic snowboarders; Zootopia.

Title: Ozzy & Drix
Description: Hector is out snowboarding, but gets lost outside in the cold. As if the body temperature loss isn't enough, the cold manifests itself as Cryo, a monstrous beast that shoots cold beams from its elbows.

Title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Description: Donnie and Mikey have a plan to get the piece of mystic metal from Repo Mantis, but Raph and Leo have their own ideas how things should be done. / Ghostbear decides to mess with the TMNT while they are having a fun time in the snow.

Title: RWBY
Description: Out in the snowy tundra, the Ace Ops show teams RWBY and JNR the ropes.

Title: Johnny Test
Description: It's snowing in the middle of summer. Cool! Who would win in the ultimate battle of "Uncle?"

Title: Wussywat the Clumsy Cat
Description: It's a cold snowy day in the garden, so Ird suggests doing some exercises to keep warm. When more snow starts to fall, Ird and Ortus make a snowman, while Duckadile and Wussywat go sledging.

Title: Cloudbabies
Description: The Sun is sad because the snow melts whenever he tries to make a snowball.

Title: Olobob Top
Description: The Olobobs are playing Opposite Day, but it confuses everyone, especially when they create a dragon who breathes snowflakes. What they need is an Opposite Opposite Day.

Title: Little Ghosts
Description: The ghosts play in the fresh fallen snow.

Title: Rod, Jane and Freddy
Description: The world has been covered in snow. So Rod, Jane and Freddy get all dressed up in warm clothes to build Mr. Snowman. Freddy plays a hot chestnut salesman. Rod pretends to be a deer and all three dress up like penguins.

Title: Alpha Book Club
Description: Hector Navarro shares his thoughts on Jack Torrance and the Overlook Hotel with Maude Garrett and Rachel Heine as they continue to trudge into the snow as cover up to chapter 40 in The Shining.

Title: Heartland
Description: Noted horse whisperer, Marion Fleming and her daughter, have a truck accident during the rescue of an abused horse named Spartan. Marion is killed, Amy wakes up in the hospital, and the ...                See full summary »

Title: The Remarkable Mr. King
Description: Mr. King makes his own cool pool on a hot day. Mr. King builds a giant umbrella to keep the rain away, but then realizes rain is good. Mr. King blows snow from his yard creating a Swirlywind that takes his pals on a wild ride.

Title: Parental Control
Description: Mom and dad try to break up Ashley and Matt with Brandon and Ryan who take her snowboarding and go karts.

Title: Top Wing
Description: Cadets are back for more extreme sports challenges of Big Swirl Games; turbo-surfing, skateboarding, snowboarding, and more. Twitch the new cadet has a great place to build a new home for her dad and brother, all done with her Power Mover.

Title: Meet the Natives
Description: The ambassadors of Tanna embark on a trip to Peoria, Illinois -- an industrial heartland in Middle America. Chief and the tribe partake in the tradition of Thanksgiving and discover the value of sharing equals their own in Tanna.

Title: Single Parents
Description: When Graham writes a letter to Santa asking for either a white Christmas or to meet his father, Angie goes on a mission to find snow; Rory, Emma and Amy find out that Poppy and Douglas are romantically involved.

Title: Wardens
Description: Michigan Conservation Officers in the U. P. have a lengthy snowmobile season to patrol. From sound checks to safe riding on trails, it's never a dull day in the snow.

Title: Rainbow Rangers
Description: A spring morning snowstorm is followed by an abrupt afternoon warm-up, causing a flood of melted snow that threatens the local wildlife; an otter loses her favorite rock.

Title: What-a-Mess
Description: What-a-Mess and His pals must defend their corner fire hydrant from a rival gang. Trash goes through His history and learns what would happen if He never existed. What-a-Mess has an adventure at a ski resort while keeping a snowman safe.

Title: My Friend Rabbit
Description: Rabbit creates a big surprise in the hope of cheering up Hazel; Rabbit and Mouse want to make winter come early so they can play with an exciting new snow toy.

Title: Big Hero 6: The Series
Description: When Hiro finds a wrapped present in the closet, he assumes it's from Aunt Cass and takes it in order to figure out what it is. However, after a mix-up, the present becomes lost and Hiro enlists the Big Hero 6 team to track it down.

Title: The Daily Talk Show
Description: We chat about Josh's obsession with books and how many he's read, school trips to the snow, and what happens if you wear other people's glasses.

Title: Panik i tomteverkstan
Description: At home in the Santa village, Santa discovers that someone is eating his Santa porridge at night. He tries to find the mysterious porridge thief. The snowman is starting to get worried about Santa's strange behavior

Title: Angus & Cheryl
Description: Angus has spent all winter with his new friend, the snowman and feels he has bonded with him. So he decides to bring him into the house - much to Cheryl's disgust.

Title: My Floating Home
Description: Laurence's dream is to move into an upgraded floating pad. He hopes to fix up the interior himself and re-design the layout with an open living plan. At the final stages, snow and flood warnings add to the challenge.

Title: Let's Make a Deal
Description: All Hail Wayne Brady, King of Malta! Find out how THIS happens by the end of the show! Plus, a pro snowboarder plays "Car Pong", and a big surprise during the Big Deal! Wayne Brady hosts.

Title: The Secret Life of Suckers
Description: The weather outside is frightful but the suckers are getting ready. The calm after the storm... and the ball fight after the snow.

Title: Zapp me
Description: "Love" Thomas is a drummer, snowboards and dream of being an actor. The skier Tonje always fall in love with a Sámi. Why? Jon is adopted from Colombia and joiks a lot. Thomas and Petra plan for their future. Ritva loves horseback riding.

Title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh
Description: When Darby loses a tooth, Pooh and Tigger search for it; Roo is upset when his snowman starts to melt.

Title: Albie
Description: Albie is building a snowman when he's interrupted by Mr. Kidhater-Cox, who accuses him of stealing his new gloves.

Title: Show by Rock!! Mashumairesh!!
Description: Howan leaves her snowy village for the big city to try and debut as an artist.

Title: Little Bear
Description: Noticing Little Bear's cabin fever and Father Bear's frustration at working on a budget, Mother Bear sends them out for a walk in the snow which turns into a giant snowball fight.

Title: Beautiful Baking with Juliet Sear
Description: Juliet prepares desserts that are perfect for when the holiday season rolls around. She makes a festive reindeer cake, a gingerbread house cake, a candy cane cake, and snowmen cakes.

Title: Sunday Today with Willie Geist
Description: A Sunday Sitdown with actor Josh Gad (Avenue 5 (2020)); snow artist Simon Beck.

Title: The Profit
Description: Hatbox is owned by Lauri Turner and RAMP Sports is a store that is majority-owned by Lou Sardella which specializes in snowboards and skis. While Marcus is there, he is having trouble getting answers his questions about the business.

Title: Madame's Place
Description: A freak snowstorm brings Hollywood to its knees during sweeps week, forcing Madame to put her staff and family to work on that evening's show.

Title: Raising Miranda
Description: Miranda and Donald's attempt to spend Christmas away from home, and memories of Mom, are thwarted by a snowstorm.

Title: The Handmaid's Tale
Description: June draws on all her resources and relationships, risking everything to ensure her own kind of justice.

Title: The Sonny and Cher Comedy Hour
Description: Christmas 1973 episode with guest William Conrad. Opening song "Jingle Bells." Skits: Indian and bear searching for snow, hobo looking for dinner. Last half of show has Christmas songs and Sonny's Pizza skit.

Title: The Goop Lab
Description: Can a shock to the system relieve stress? Chill staffers learn "Iceman" Wim Hof's breathing techniques, do "snowga" and leap into a freezing Lake Tahoe.

Title: Op-Docs
Description: This New York Times Op-Doc celebrates the achievements of Caleb Moore, a competitive snowmobiler who was the first to fatally crash at the X Games.

Title: Ranma ½: Nettô-hen
Description: A giant snowman steps from a helicopter onto Furinkan High School. It's none other than the school principal, who just came back from Hawaii and is eager to institute an unbelievably strict new school rule!

Title: Bubble Guppies
Description: Windy Pete sails around the world and blasts tropical climates with snow.

Title: Everyday Driver
Description: When the snow falls, many people seek out large AWD transportation. We take a new Miata RF and see if a small RWD sports car can work as a snowmobile.

Title: Smashhdown!
Description: A teenage skateboarding star shows us how to Shuvit, we discover the science of balance, we flashback to crazy Winter Olympics snowboarding stuff-up then its the Table-Tennis-Obstacle Course.

Title: Our World, Their World
Description: 'Wilderness Specialists' - animals that survive in snowy conditions in Canada, Alaska, Siberia and Scandinavia. Features bears, wolverines and lemmings among others.

Title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
Description: The whole neighborhood converges on the Harrison property when Rivet invents a dome to keep the backyard warm during the winter because the robots are terrified of snow.

Title: Make Me a Supermodel
Description: The models head off on a winter getaway for a photo shoot that involves speed and snow, where they are tested on their ability to stay focused in challenging circumstances.

Title: Hello from My Front Porch
Description: "Hello From My Front Porch" S3E42: If weather reports hold true, Iowa will have it's first 'major' snow storm of the season hit this weekend.

Title: BR4N ON
Description: DON BR4N finds himself trapped in a snow globe telling Christmas tales from somewhere over in Germany. It's not warm and there are too many sausages for DON BR4N to try.

Title: Best Sports Ever!

Title: Adrenaline - Athlete Profile
Description: Blaine Stephenson is a professional snowmobile racer from Hutchinson, Minnesota who has overcome traumatic injuries to emerge as a competition champion.

Title: Connor's Monthly Vlog
Description: Connor starts the new decade snowed under with work, whilst also attending a Film Festival and spending time with friends for a birthday celebration.

Title: Best Bugs Forever

Title: This Hour Has 22 Minutes
Description: Peter MacKay runs for Conservative leadership, Newfoundlanders love the army for shoveling their snow, Mark and CNN Royal Commentator Victoria Arbiter discuss Megxit, Doug Ford takes on teachers, $5 note gets a facelift, Super Bowl begins.

Title: Clangers
Description: The Cloud catches a chill and starts dropping snowflakes

Title: Verrückt nach Meer
Description: Journey of the Grand Lady: Philippines I. Rough sea. Uwe and Marion in the (wave) pool. Filipinos look forward to meeting their family. Laura helps making an oversized cake. Donation for children: snow ball auction. The Hollywood show.

Title: Building Giants

Title: Pop Trivia
Description: Did you know the snow scene in #Inception was inspired by #ChristopherNolan's favorite Bond movie? Discover more fun facts in Pop Trivia.

Title: Boy & Dragon
Description: Dragon's beloved princess lives far, far away. To meet her, he must cross deadly mountains, freezing snow, and lava-spewing volcanoes. To make matters worse, Boy doesn't want to go.

Title: Tinpo

Description: A grieving and suicidal widow gets a very unexpected visitor on a snowy Valentine's Day, but nothing is quite what it seems.

Description: A snowstorm during Kinnikuman and Robin Mask's match freezes both competitors./After Kinnikuman accidentally removes Robin Mask's mask during their match, he must face Robin's wrath.

Description: Modifying a snowmobile into a water skipping adrenaline toy.

Description: Add a Plot

Description: Caillou spends a day outside finding different ways to play in the snow.

Description: The top four gets ready for the snow ball by bringing 3 looks. With special guest judge, drag race legend Michelle Visage.

Description: While Andrea prepares to celebrate Hanukkah, Ignatius inadvertantly brings a huge, angry snowman to life. Krypto manages to defeat the angry snowmen just in time for everyone to celebrate Hanukkah.

Description: A magic friendly snowman leads the Buddis through a winter wonderland, where they find a frozen pond for ice skating and a cozy igloo for stargazing.

Title: Spoopy Movie Time
Description: The Gang watch SnowBeast, a movie written by the same person that wrote Psycho, we aren't quite sure what happened to him between time, we are guessing snowmobiling accident.

Description: Steve has a theory that their world is actually inside a snow globe, but is this actually true?

Description: Secret Scientist Dr. Paul Cheechoo's team accidentally disturbs an Inuit "summoning chamber," unleashing both a violent snowstorm and a wolf-like Amarok.

Description: Gene courts a bizarre assortment of pro-riders in an attempt to find a spokesperson for his new snowboard apparel line.

Title: Corner Gas
Description: Winning a meat raffle leads to Karen and Davis falling out with Emma and Oscar. Hank dons a snowsuit to play a joke on Brent and ends up frying. Lacey and Wanda become "pet parents" to virtual pet Darren.

Title: Mighty 6

Description: Add a Plot

Description: FiZone are back to show us how to survive a deadly snowstorm in this map inspired by Project Winter.

Title: It Takes Two
Description: Sam feels left out when he accompanies Molly to a women's law conference in New York. Mama entertains Lisa with family stories when a blackout occurs during a snowstorm.

Title: Webster
Description: During a massive snowstorm, Webster gets trapped in a secret passage in the house.

Description: An enchanting film that invites us into a winter wonderland. Starting with the birth of a single snowflake, we journey through a spectrum of snowscapes. Narrated by Cillian Murphy.

Title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?

Description: Ollie makes himself a new friend out of snow. He does his best to keep it safe from Mabel and Charles' snowballing antics.

Description: Mary becomes sick just before Liza leaves on a book tour, causing the author to have a nightmare.

Title: A kockásfülü nyúl
Description: Menyus build a snowman, but a big guy breaks it down. The rabbit with checkered ears hurries to help.

Title: Discovering the World
Description: The Finland of reindeer farmers, the aurora borealis, and Santa Claus also includes an eventful history with its neighbors. It is as if you can smell the fir trees, touch the colors of snow and sun, and feel the hospitality found here.

Title: Dexter: New Blood

Title: The CBeebies House Show
